changeSet.author: Kiruthiga

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) from concept_name where name IN ("µg", "application(s)", "capsule(s)", "dose", "gram", "IU", "mg", "ml", "mmol", "puff(s)", "tablet(s)") and concept_name_type ="FULLY_SPECIFIED";

changeSet.author: Kiruthiga

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM concept_set WHERE concept_id in (SELECT concept_id FROM concept_name WHERE name IN ("tablet(s)", "capsule(s)")) AND concept_set = (SELECT concept_id FROM concept_name WHERE name = "Dosing Units" AND concept_name_type ="FULLY_SPECIFIED" );

changeSet.comment: Delete dosing units capsule(s) and tablet(s)

changeSet.author: Kiruthiga
Kiruthiga

changeSet.author: Kiruthiga
Kiruthiga

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM concept_name WHERE name IN ("Once a day") AND concept_name_type ="FULLY_SPECIFIED";

changeSet.comment: Update frequency from Once a day to Every 24 hours
changeSet.sql:
SELECT concept_id INTO @concept_id1 FROM concept_name WHERE name = "Once a day" AND concept_name_type ="FULLY_SPECIFIED";
UPDATE concept_name SET name ="Every 24 hours" WHERE concept_id = @concept_id1 AND concept_name_type="FULLY_SPECIFIED";

changeSet.author: Kiruthiga

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM order_frequency WHERE concept_id in (SELECT concept_id FROM concept_name WHERE name IN ("Every 24 hours") AND concept_name_type ="FULLY_SPECIFIED");
